snippet: A plan by House leaders to cut $40 billion from the food stamp program threatens to derail efforts by the House and Senate to complete a farm bill before agriculture programs expire on Sept. 30.
lead_paragraph: A plan by House leaders to cut $40 billion from the food stamp program threatens to derail efforts by the House and Senate to complete a farm bill before agriculture programs expire on Sept. 30.

headline.main: G.O.P. Push to Slash Food Stamps Puts Farm Bill in Jeopardy
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Push to Slash Food Stamps Puts Farm Bill in Jeopardy
